item.title: Ahoy!
item.description: Ahoy! Welcome back. Certainly glad you could find your way here! Clearly things look a bit different now running on Hugo than they did on the older Jekyll iteration of this site… So Why the change? Mainly due to Jekyll being a maintaince nightmare at times, and I wanted to learn a new technology to reduce the bloat and maintanince. Furthermore, I’ve been working on a lot more posts and project write-ups that haven’t found thier way on here just yet due to time constraints (Bay Area commutes are no joke), however I’m working on changing this so that I am able to have the time to learn and write more - and of course publish!

item.title: Deploying a React app with GitHub Pages
